Title: Relates to the transparency and quality of care of operators of adult care facilities
Summary: Relates to the transparency and quality of care of operators of adult care facilities; requires certain applicants for adult care facilities to provide an opportunity for public comment on the application.
LawCode: Amd ยง461-b, Soc Serv L
ActClause: AN ACT to amend the social services law, in relation to the transparency and quality of care of operators of adult care facilities
